text: Ixora foliosa is a species of flowering plant in the family Rubiaceae. It is found in western Cameroon and eastern Nigeria. Its natural habitats are subtropical or tropical moist lowland forests and subtropical or tropical moist montane forests. It is threatened by habitat loss. ==Sources== * Cheek. M. 2004. Ixora foliosa. 2006 IUCN Red List of Threatened Species. Downloaded on 22 August 2007. ==External links== *World Checklist of Rubiaceae foliosa Category:Vulnerable plants Category:Taxonomy articles created by Polbot
title: Ixora foliosa
